title: Panama - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Panama stands at BBB with negative outlook. Moody's credit rating for Panama was last set at Baa2 with negative outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Panama was last reported at BBB- with stable outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Panama thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Panama as reported by major credit rating agencies.
